message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $14000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a valuable asset worth more than $12000 to you, at a competitive price. I believe this offer presents a great value for you and would be delighted to see it in your hands.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. I really like the product, but I have to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
